constraints.definition: PRIMARY KEY (key)
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
PRIMARY KEY (id)
FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES profiles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
PRIMARY KEY (profile_id)
FOREIGN KEY (conversation_id) REFERENCES conversations(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES profiles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
PRIMARY KEY (conversation_id, profile_id)
FOREIGN KEY (scenario_id) REFERENCES scenarios(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
PRIMARY KEY (id)
PRIMARY KEY (key)
FOREIGN KEY (scenario_id) REFERENCES scenarios(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (scenario_id, post_id) REFERENCES posts(scenario_id, id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (scenario_id, profile_id) REFERENCES profiles(scenario_id, id) ON DELETE CASCADE
PRIMARY KEY (id)
UNIQUE (scenario_id, profile_id, post_id)
FOREIGN KEY (message_id) REFERENCES messages(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES profiles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
PRIMARY KEY (id)
UNIQUE (message_id, profile_id)
FOREIGN KEY (conversation_id) REFERENCES conversations(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (scenario_id) REFERENCES scenarios(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (sender_profile_id) REFERENCES profiles(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT
FOREIGN KEY (sender_user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT
PRIMARY KEY (id)
FOREIGN KEY (author_profile_id) REFERENCES profiles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (author_user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT
FOREIGN KEY (parent_post_id) REFERENCES posts(id) ON DELETE SET NULL
FOREIGN KEY (quoted_post_id) REFERENCES posts(id) ON DELETE SET NULL
FOREIGN KEY (scenario_id) REFERENCES scenarios(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
PRIMARY KEY (id)
FOREIGN KEY (owner_user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (scenario_id) REFERENCES scenarios(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
PRIMARY KEY (id)
PRIMARY KEY (id)
FOREIGN KEY (scenario_id) REFERENCES scenarios(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
PRIMARY KEY (scenario_id, user_id)
FOREIGN KEY (scenario_id) REFERENCES scenarios(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (tag_key) REFERENCES global_tags(key) ON DELETE RESTRICT
PRIMARY KEY (scenario_id, tag_key)
FOREIGN KEY (owner_user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT
PRIMARY KEY (id)
FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES profiles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (scenario_id) REFERENCES scenarios(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
PRIMARY KEY (user_id, scenario_id)
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
PRIMARY KEY (id)
UNIQUE (user_id, expo_push_token)
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
PRIMARY KEY (id)
UNIQUE (token_hash)
PRIMARY KEY (id)

indexes.indexdef: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX app_meta_pkey ON public.app_meta USING btree (key)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX auth_identities_pkey ON public.auth_identities USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX auth_identities_provider_uidx ON public.auth_identities USING btree (provider, provider_user_id)
CREATE INDEX auth_identities_user_idx ON public.auth_identities USING btree (user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX auth_identities_user_provider_uidx ON public.auth_identities USING btree (user_id, provider)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX character_sheets_pkey ON public.character_sheets USING btree (profile_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX conversation_participants_pkey ON public.conversation_participants USING btree (conversation_id, profile_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_conversation_participants_profile ON public.conversation_participants USING btree (profile_id, conversation_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX conversations_pkey ON public.conversations USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_conversations_scenario_last_message_at ON public.conversations USING btree (scenario_id, last_message_at DESC NULLS LAST)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX global_tags_pkey ON public.global_tags USING btree (key)
CREATE INDEX idx_likes_post ON public.likes USING btree (post_id, created_at DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_likes_profile ON public.likes USING btree (profile_id, created_at DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_likes_scenario_created_at ON public.likes USING btree (scenario_id, created_at DESC)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX likes_pkey ON public.likes USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX likes_post_idx ON public.likes USING btree (post_id, created_at DESC)
CREATE INDEX likes_profile_idx ON public.likes USING btree (profile_id, created_at DESC)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX likes_profile_post_unique ON public.likes USING btree (scenario_id, profile_id, post_id)
CREATE INDEX likes_scenario_idx ON public.likes USING btree (scenario_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_message_reads_message ON public.message_reads USING btree (message_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_message_reads_profile ON public.message_reads USING btree (profile_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX message_reads_message_id_profile_id_key ON public.message_reads USING btree (message_id, profile_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX message_reads_pkey ON public.message_reads USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_conversation_created_at ON public.messages USING btree (conversation_id, created_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_scenario_created_at ON public.messages USING btree (scenario_id, created_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_sender_user_id_created_at ON public.messages USING btree (sender_user_id, created_at)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX messages_pkey ON public.messages USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_posts_author_user_id_created_at ON public.posts USING btree (author_user_id, created_at DESC, id DESC)
CREATE INDEX posts_author_created_idx ON public.posts USING btree (author_profile_id, created_at DESC)
CREATE INDEX posts_parent_idx ON public.posts USING btree (parent_post_id)
CREATE INDEX posts_pins_idx ON public.posts USING btree (scenario_id, is_pinned, pin_order) WHERE (is_pinned = true)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX posts_pkey ON public.posts USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX posts_post_type_idx ON public.posts USING btree (scenario_id, post_type)
CREATE INDEX posts_quoted_idx ON public.posts USING btree (quoted_post_id)
CREATE INDEX posts_scenario_created_idx ON public.posts USING btree (scenario_id, created_at DESC)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX posts_scenario_id_id_uidx ON public.posts USING btree (scenario_id, id)
CREATE INDEX posts_scenario_inserted_idx ON public.posts USING btree (scenario_id, inserted_at DESC, id DESC)
CREATE INDEX profiles_owner_idx ON public.profiles USING btree (owner_user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX profiles_pkey ON public.profiles USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX profiles_scenario_handle_uidx ON public.profiles USING btree (scenario_id, lower(handle))
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX profiles_scenario_id_id_uidx ON public.profiles USING btree (scenario_id, id)
CREATE INDEX profiles_scenario_idx ON public.profiles USING btree (scenario_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX repost_pkey ON public.reposts USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX reposts_profile_post_uidx ON public.reposts USING btree (profile_id, post_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX scenario_players_pkey ON public.scenario_players USING btree (scenario_id, user_id)
CREATE INDEX scenario_players_user_idx ON public.scenario_players USING btree (user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX scenario_tags_pkey ON public.scenario_tags USING btree (scenario_id, tag_key)
CREATE INDEX scenario_tags_tag_idx ON public.scenario_tags USING btree (tag_key)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX scenarios_invite_code_uidx ON public.scenarios USING btree (upper(invite_code))
CREATE INDEX scenarios_mode_idx ON public.scenarios USING btree (mode)
CREATE INDEX scenarios_owner_idx ON public.scenarios USING btree (owner_user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX scenarios_pkey ON public.scenarios USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX selected_profile_by_user_scenario_pkey ON public.selected_profile_by_user_scenario USING btree (user_id, scenario_id)
CREATE INDEX selected_profile_by_user_scenario_profile_idx ON public.selected_profile_by_user_scenario USING btree (profile_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_user_push_tokens_user ON public.user_push_tokens USING btree (user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_push_tokens_pkey ON public.user_push_tokens USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_push_tokens_user_id_expo_push_token_key ON public.user_push_tokens USING btree (user_id, expo_push_token)
CREATE INDEX idx_user_sessions_user_active ON public.user_sessions USING btree (user_id) WHERE (revoked_at IS NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_user_sessions_user_last_seen ON public.user_sessions USING btree (user_id, last_seen_at DESC, id DESC)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_sessions_pkey ON public.user_sessions USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_sessions_token_hash_key ON public.user_sessions USING btree (token_hash)
CREATE INDEX users_deleted_idx ON public.users USING btree (is_deleted, deleted_at)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_email_uidx ON public.users USING btree (lower(email)) WHERE (email IS NOT NULL)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_pkey ON public.users USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_username_uidx ON public.users USING btree (lower(username))

triggers.definition: CREATE TRIGGER trg_messages_touch_conversation_last_message AFTER INSERT ON messages FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION touch_conversation_last_message()
